item.description:
Please join me for an event I attend every year - it's a lot of fun cruising down the river at dusk and nighttime with all the lights along the shoreline and on the yachts and boats all around. It's beautiful! There is lots of food, a great dj, dance floor, etc. Or, just sit back, relax (indoors or outdoors) and enjoy the ride!

The Autism Allstars are joining forces for the 4th straight year with Captain's Fishing Parties to raise funds for autism research. Please join us for a fun evening cruising down the Merrimack River. There will be a buffet, entertainment, dancing, and a cash bar. Ticket proceeds will go towards the Allstars' fundraising efforts for the 2010 Greater Boston Walk Now for Autism.

The boat wil depart at 6:00 pm sharp, so please try to... arrive by 5:45 pm.

Rain date will be Sunday, September 12, 2010 (6:00pm to 9:00 pm)

Tickets are only $35 each (and it's a donation to charity!) and they include the cruise, your dinner, your entertainment, and a donation. The only thing you have to do is come and have fun.

Click Here to Buy your Tickets Now: http://www.eventbrite...

Just drive out to the end of Plum Island - we may also carpool!
item.name: 4th Annual Merrimack River Boat Dinner Cruise to benefit Autism Speaks - Sat eve
